CustomField.formula:
IF(
AND(
VALUE(LEFT( TEXT( Mardi_Ouverture__c ) , 2)) < 12,
VALUE(LEFT( TEXT( Mercredi_Ouverture__c ) , 2)) < 12,
VALUE(LEFT( TEXT( Jeudi_Ouverture__c ) , 2)) < 12,
VALUE(LEFT( TEXT( Vendredi_Ouverture__c ) , 2)) < 12,
VALUE(LEFT( TEXT( Samedi_Ouverture__c ) , 2)) < 12),
IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Green"), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red"))
CustomField.label: Ouvert les matins
